name: Pitch Black Golf
description:
Golf games take to long... in this game you don't have to worry about direction or even clubs. It is all about percentage. 

You will face fake people from all around the world and hear fake commentary regarding their backstories.

Controls:

Enter power(0-100) and press enter. 

(Pressing enter without a value = 100%)

On the green you will get a X% chance of making a putt. If you choose y will go for it and risk a 3 putt while n will land a safe 2 putt.
